name: Buster Sword
description:
The Buster Sword is an enormous broadsword. From tip to handle, it is approximately five to six feet long, with a single-edged large blade approximately one foot wide
Deals 10 damage

name: Master Sword
description:
The Master Sword is a divine magic sword with the power to vanquish evil. Infused with the sacred flames provided by the Golden Goddesses and blessed with Hylia's power
Deals 10 damage
win_front: used the power of the triforce to vanquish
win_back: from the face of the earth

name: Leviathan Axe
description:
The Leviathan axe legendary two-handed battle axe imbued with elemental magic allowing it to return to the user
Deals 40 damage

name: Portal Gun
description:
The Portal Gun is a hand-held device which has the ability to manufacture two linked portals. No matter the distance between them, any object which passes through one portal will emerge from the other and vice versa instantaneously
Deals 40 damage

name: Virtuous Treaty
description:
The Virtuous Treaty is a pure white samurai blade not sullied by a single drop of blood
Deals 50 damage

name: Coronacht
description:
The Coronacht is an infernal arm, the finest bow ever conceived, once wielded by Mistress Hera
Deals 60 damage
win_front: used the aspect of Hera to shoot a power shot right through

name: Zenith
description:
The Zenith is a legendary blade crafted using 10 different powerful swords
Deals 70 damage

name: RGX Butterfly Knife
description:
The RGX Butterfly Knife is the most powerful butterfly knife on earth due to its RGB
Deals 60 damage
win_front: performed the valorant inspect flawlessly causing

name: Elder Wand
description: The most powerful wand on earth

name: Marksman Revolver
description:
A revolver. Every few seconds a coin pops out of the bottom of the gun. The purpose of this function is lost on you
Deals 50 damage

name: Toy Knife
description:
Made of plastic. A rarity nowadays
Deals 1 damage

name: X Baton
description:
The X Baton is a police baton capable of transforming between three different styles, each with their own unique abilities and merits
Deals 100 damage
